pageProduct.name: Sukin Blemish Control Pore Perfecting Toner 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Blemishes? Banish them, naturally! Our Pore Perfecting Toner infuses bacteria fighting Eucalyptus and Tea Tree Oil to purify the skin, whilst Quince acts as an astringent, refining the pores and skin texture, while also limiting skin shine! Willowherb naturally helps to reduce the prevalence of acne causing bacteria on the skin

Common Uses

Your natural alternative to Benzoyl Peroxide! This blemish busting range will get to work after just 30 minutes to fight the causes of breakouts. Featuring proven native ingredients to leave skin healthy and clear

Ingredients

Water(Aqua), Glycerin,AloeBarbadensis Leaf Juice, Cydonia Oblonga Leaf Extract(Quince), Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract(Green Tea/White Tea), Zingiber Officinale(Ginger)Root Extract, Mentha Piperita(Peppermint)Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia(Tea Tree)Leaf Oil,EucalyptusCitriodora Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis(Rosemary)Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia(Lavender)Oil, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Salicylic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate, Sodium Surfactin, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Linalool*.

Directions

Soak a cotton pad or cloth and gently wipe over face. Use AM & PM following your cleanser.
